channel.title: I need a good Anti SYI or any Bot used to spam! i only want 1-2 accounts per ip!
channel.description:
iv been getting ALOT of spammers like SYI's, Random numbers, spaces bettween names, etc.
I want to make it so there can only be a max of 1-3 accounts logged in at a time per IP adress, iv tryed to use several long tuts. none work always Messes up my server one way or another. please help me out here this gets annoying and i know some one can help me so please do if you may :)
